header.name: How it works
header.text: The Ichi oneToken Factory allows any user to mint a stablecoin with their favorite cryptocurrency. Tokens are always redeemable for $1, and create a community treasury to stimulate rewards

header.name: oneTokens
header.text: Ichi supports the following stablecoins, collateralized with your favorite cryptocurrencies.

oneTokens.name: oneBTC
oneTokens.text: The Ichi oneToken Factory allows any user to mint a stablecoin with their favorite cryptocurrency.

oneTokens.text: The Ichi oneToken Factory allows any user to mint a stablecoin with their favorite cryptocurrency

oneTokens.text: The Ichi oneToken Factory allows any user to mint a stablecoin with their favorite cryptocurrency

header.name: Join the community
header.text: Drop by our Telegram to join the community, learn about ICHI, start farming, and govern the project
